title: Have-a-go heroes catch robbery suspect after armed jewellery raid
text:
A group of have-a-go heroes tackled a robbery suspect as he fled the scene of an armed raid on a jewellery shop.

He was one of three men that rammed their way into Sultan Jewellers in Shepherd's Bush, west London, on Friday.

The gang, all dressed in black and wearing motorcycle helmets to cover their faces, drove a Range Rover through the shop's window to get inside.

They used sledgehammers and knuckledusters to threaten shop workers and smash open the display cabinets before stuffing the jewellery into bags.

A group of brave bystanders confronted the men as they emerged from the shop and managed to pin one suspect to the ground.
description: A group of have-a-go heroes tackled a robbery suspect as he fled the scene of an armed raid on a jewellery shop.
